pqc_capability_description: First quantum-safe fork of Bitcoin. Testnet replaces ECDSA with NIST-standardized ML-DSA signatures to protect against quantum threats. Increased block size to 64 MiB to accommodate larger PQC signatures (38-72x larger than ECDSA). Full transaction lifecycle with quantum-resistant cryptography. Protects ~6.26M BTC in addresses with exposed public keys against Harvest Now Decrypt Later attacks.
product_brief: First quantum-safe Bitcoin fork demonstrating ML-DSA feasibility for blockchain signatures. Open permissionless testnet for miners developers researchers and users.

pqc_capability_description: Japan's first remote access system with built-in post-quantum cryptographic protection powered by 01 Quantum. Implements NIST FIPS 203 (ML-KEM) to protect against Harvest Now Decrypt Later attacks. Free upgrade for existing customers. Serving ~7000 companies and 36000 users primarily in finance sector. In production since 2002.
product_brief: First commercial remote access product in Japan with production-ready NIST-standardized PQC. Demonstrates enterprise readiness for PQC in remote access scenarios.

pqc_capability_description: First post-quantum testnet for Solana blockchain developed in collaboration with Solana Foundation. Replaces EdDSA signatures with NIST-standardized ML-DSA demonstrating quantum-resistant transactions are practical on high-throughput blockchain architectures (65000+ TPS). Open-sourced testnet with readiness assessments and migration test environments. $20M Series A funding announced January 2026.
product_brief: Demonstrates high-throughput blockchains can successfully implement post-quantum signatures. Critical for Web3 and decentralized finance PQC migration.

pqc_capability_description: Post-quantum semiconductor-based trust anchors deployed in U.S. systems. QS7001 and QVault-TPM post-quantum secure processors incorporating quantum-resistant algorithms and hardware roots of trust. Protection against harvest-now-decrypt-later attacks. Millions of devices deployed worldwide. Joint venture with Kaynes SemiCon in India for PQC chip manufacturing.
product_brief: Post-quantum semiconductor chips with embedded quantum-resistant cryptography. First deployments in U.S. government and critical infrastructure.

pqc_capability_description: Hardware-based plug-and-play post-quantum encryption platform. NSA CNSA 2.0 compliant protocol-agnostic solution working with legacy and modern networks. Features one-way data diode with NIST-approved PQC algorithms including ML-KEM. Tested by all U.S. military branches including SpaceX deployment. Secures data in transit without software rewrites or PKI dependencies.
product_brief: Hardware-based quantum-resistant encryption for high-security environments. Successfully deployed on military and space missions.

pqc_capability_description: First end-to-end cryptographic security platform for quantum era. Provides cryptographic discovery (Recon) crypto-agility engine (Resilience) and real-time compliance reporting. Enables dynamic cipher key and algorithm updates without code changes or downtime. Works across cloud on-premise and edge environments. Includes QuEverywhere for mobile PQC.
product_brief: Platform enabling organizations to transition to PQC with crypto-agility and zero-downtime cipher updates.

pqc_capability_description: Platform for automated discovery and inventory of cryptographic assets. Facilitates transition to post-quantum cryptography and enhances cyber readiness against AI-powered attacks. Provides continuous visibility into cryptographic dependencies. Deployed in U.S. Department of War CIO systems. HQC algorithm contributor selected by NIST.
product_brief: Crypto-agility platform with automated cryptographic asset discovery for PQC migration. Powers DoW quantum readiness.

pqc_capability_description: NIST-aligned quantum-safe cryptographic engine. Powers Hitachi DoMobile Ver.5 remote access system in Japan. Developing Quantum AI Wrapper (QAW) for securing AI data with Full Homomorphic Encryption and Quantum Crypto Wrapper (QCW) for blockchain quantum-safety. Early-stage quantum-safe security leader.
product_brief: NIST-compliant quantum-safe engine enabling partners to deploy PQC. Focus on agile deployment and AI/blockchain security.

pqc_capability_description: Implements HQC (Hamming Quasi-Cyclic) and ML-KEM for .NET platform. Provides quantum-resistant key exchange mechanisms with good performance characteristics on .NET runtime.
product_brief: C# implementation of cryptographic algorithms for .NET platform with PQC interoperability support.

pqc_capability_description: Comprehensive PQC implementation supporting ML-KEM, ML-DSA, SLH-DSA, and HQC (Hamming Quasi-Cyclic). Provides quantum-resistant key encapsulation and digital signatures through JCE/JCA provider. Supports hybrid classical/PQC modes for gradual migration.
product_brief: Comprehensive Java implementation of cryptographic algorithms. Supports JCE/JCA provider lightweight API PGP S/MIME DTLS TLS OCSP TSP CMP and certificate generation.

pqc_capability_description: Long-term support release with ML-DSA composite signatures, enabling hybrid quantum-classical signature schemes. Allows organizations to use both traditional (RSA/ECDSA) and post-quantum signatures simultaneously for defense-in-depth.
product_brief: Long-term support release with enterprise stability. Includes PQC support and supply chain transparency features.

pqc_capability_description: Full support for NIST-standardized PQC algorithms including ML-KEM (Module-Lattice-Based Key-Encapsulation Mechanism) for key exchange, ML-DSA (Module-Lattice-Based Digital Signature Algorithm) for signatures, and SLH-DSA (Stateless Hash-Based Digital Signature Algorithm). Enables quantum-safe TLS 1.3 connections with hybrid mode support.
product_brief: Robust commercial-grade TLS/SSL and crypto library. Implements TLS 1.3 DTLS 1.3 and QUIC protocols. Reference implementation for cryptographic operations used by majority of HTTPS websites.

pqc_capability_description: Multi-language library (C++, Go, Java) supporting FIPS 204/205 signatures. ML-KEM in progress. Used in Google infrastructure and Cloud KMS.
product_brief: Google's multi-language crypto library designed for safe and simple API usage. Integrating full PQC suite.

pqc_capability_description: C++ cryptography library with extensive PQC support recommended by BSI. Includes Classic McEliece, FrodoKEM, and all NIST-standardized algorithms (ML-KEM, ML-DSA, SLH-DSA). Botan 2.x reached end-of-life on 2025-01-01.
product_brief: Feature-rich C++ crypto library. BSI project for PQC reference implementations.

pqc_capability_description: FIPS 140-3 validated cryptographic modules. Supports hybrid mode (classical + PQC) and includes CryptoComply PQ TLS for quantum-safe data in transit. Drop-in OpenSSL compatibility. CryptoComply Go v4.0 adds all NIST PQC algorithms (ML-KEM FIPS 203 ML-DSA FIPS 204 SLH-DSA FIPS 205). PQC capabilities rolled out across Core v3.5 Mobile v3.5 Java v4 and Go v4.
product_brief: Enterprise cryptographic modules with immediate PQC support and FIPS validation.

pqc_capability_description: Version 8.6 introduces quantum-safe TLS 1.3 with hybrid key exchange (X25519MLKEM768). Integrates liboqs implementations of ML-KEM and ML-DSA.
product_brief: SAP's proprietary cryptographic library now enabling PQC for SAP applications and secure communications.

pqc_capability_description: Comprehensive SDK for PQC integration. Features PQCryptoLib-Core (FIPS 140-3 certified) and PQCryptoLib-Soft. Supports mobile, server, and embedded.
product_brief: High-assurance post-quantum cryptography SDK for enterprise and embedded security.

pqc_capability_description: Native ML-KEM-768 and ML-KEM-1024 implementation. Go 1.26 enables hybrid post-quantum key exchanges in TLS by default combining classical elliptic-curve cryptography with ML-KEM. Adds crypto/hpke and crypto/mlkem/mlkemtest packages with derandomized encapsulation for known-answer tests. FIPS 203 compliant.
product_brief: Standard library implementation of NIST FIPS 203 key encapsulation. Go 1.26 enables hybrid PQC TLS by default.

pqc_capability_description: Pure Rust implementation of NIST FIPS 203 ML-KEM. Modular, zero-unsafe code (mostly), and part of the RustCrypto organization.
product_brief: Pure Rust ML-KEM implementation standardizing on FIPS 203.

pqc_capability_description: Pure Rust implementation of NIST FIPS 204 ML-DSA signatures. Provides highly modular and type-safe interface for next-gen digital signatures.
product_brief: Pure Rust ML-DSA implementation compliant with FIPS 204.

pqc_capability_description: Pure Rust implementation of NIST FIPS 205 SLH-DSA (SPHINCS+) hash-based signatures. suitable for high-security applications requiring conservative security assumptions.
product_brief: Pure Rust SLH-DSA implementation compliant with FIPS 205.

pqc_capability_description: Rust bindings to PQClean C implementations. Access to a wide range of NIST PQC candidates and standardized algorithms.
product_brief: Rust wrapper around PQClean providing FFI bindings to reference implementations.

pqc_capability_description: High-level Rust wrapper for liboqs C library. Provides safe abstractions for NIST PQC algorithms supported by the Open Quantum Safe project.
product_brief: Official Rust bindings for the Open Quantum Safe library.

pqc_capability_description: Formally verified and optimized C/Assembly implementation of ML-KEM. Part of Linux Foundation PQCA PQ Code Package. Proven memory safety and functional correctness. Reached stable v1.0.0 release.
product_brief: High-assurance production-ready ML-KEM implementation formally verified for correctness.

pqc_capability_description: Minimal functionality cryptographic library for bare-metal embedded systems. Now includes HQC and SHA-3/SHAKE PQC primitives.
product_brief: Lean crypto library optimized for small footprint embedded environments.

pqc_capability_description: Implementation of ETSI TS 104 015 Quantum-Safe Hybrid Key Exchanges with Hidden Access Policies. Enables attribute-based encryption (ABE) with post-quantum security.
product_brief: Attribute-based encryption with quantum resistance, compliant with ETSI TS 104 015.

pqc_capability_description: Library for benchmarking and testing PQC on ARM Cortex-M4 microcontrollers. Contains optimized implementations of ML-KEM, ML-DSA, etc.
product_brief: Testing and benchmarking framework for PQC on embedded ARM Cortex-M4 devices.

pqc_capability_description: NIST-selected backup Key Encapsulation Mechanism (March 2025). Code-based cryptography offering an alternative to lattice-based ML-KEM.
product_brief: Reference implementation of the Hamming Quasi-Cyclic (HQC) KEM.

pqc_capability_description: Rust library for Citadel Protocol with multi-layered encryption and anti-replay protection. Features novel 3D matrix ratcheting and scramcryption.
product_brief: PQC library for Citadel Protocol with built-in anti-replay and ratcheting.

pqc_capability_description: Core cryptographic library for Windows Azure and Microsoft 365. Now integrated with ML-KEM and XMSS stateful signatures. Undergoing FIPS 140-3 validation for PQC module.
product_brief: Microsoft's core crypto library powering Windows Azure and O365. Optimized for performance and FIPS compliance.

pqc_capability_description: AWS's open-source crypto library derived from BoringSSL. First to achieve FIPS 140-3 validation for ML-KEM. Powers AWS KMS Secrets Manager and Certificate Manager.
product_brief: FIPS 140-3 validated crypto library for AWS services. Includes optimized ML-KEM and ML-DSA.

pqc_capability_description: GPU-accelerated PQC library for high-throughput workloads. Achieves 143x/99x/84x speedup over CPU for ML-KEM Keygen/Encapsulation/Decapsulation. Integrated with Open Quantum Safe (OQS) project via Linux Foundation PQCA. Essential for AI/ML security and high-performance computing.
product_brief: GPU-accelerated PQC SDK. Delivers massive throughput for ML-KEM and ML-DSA on Nvidia hardware. Now integrated with OQS.

pqc_capability_description: IOS XE 26 delivers industry-first full-stack post-quantum cryptography for enterprise routing and switching. Protects networking devices data in transit and control plane traffic with NIST-approved algorithms. Supports 8000 Series Secure Routers and C9000 Series Smart Switches. Also maintains RFC 8784 PQC PSK for IKEv2/IPsec VPN protection.
product_brief: Full-stack quantum-safe networking OS with NIST PQC algorithms for routing switching and VPN.

pqc_capability_description: Application Layer Transport Security with hybrid post-quantum key exchange (NTRU-HRSS + X25519). Protections Google's internal infrastructure traffic against quantum decryption.
product_brief: Google's internal transport security protocol now hardened with hybrid PQC.

pqc_capability_description: iMessage protocol (PQ3) achieving Level 3 security with hybrid ML-KEM. CryptoKit framework in iOS 26/macOS 26 provides ML-KEM 768/1024 and ML-DSA-65/ML-DSA-87 APIs for third-party apps via HPKE. Apple services including CloudKit Push Notifications Safari Maps Weather and iCloud Private Relay adopting quantum-secure TLS.
primary_platforms: iOS macOS iPadOS watchOS tvOS visionOS
product_brief: First messaging protocol to achieve Level 3 security with separate PQC rekeying. System-wide PQC support in Apple ecosystem via CryptoKit ML-KEM and ML-DSA APIs.

pqc_capability_description: Leverages Thales Luna HSM PQC capabilities. Microsoft Azure offers quantum-safe HSM services for enterprise customers requiring hardware-backed PQC key storage.
product_brief: Thales Luna HSMs deployed in Azure datacenters for customer-exclusive use.

pqc_capability_description: Hybrid classical/PQC mode support. Enables organizations to run dual-mode cryptographic operations combining RSA/ECC with PQC algorithms for gradual migration in regulated environments.
product_brief: Enterprise HSM solution with CodeSafe secure execution environment. Supports hybrid classical/PQC modes.

pqc_capability_description: Production-ready PQC with native ML-KEM (FIPS 203) and ML-DSA (FIPS 204) support integrated into firmware v7.9. Software v7.9.1 adds hybrid KEM (ML-KEM) for NTLS SSH and REST APIs. Firmware v7.9.2 is next FIPS 140-3 Level 3 candidate with PQC. First HSM in industry to receive FIPS 140-3 Level 3 validation. NATO Secret classification achieved.
product_brief: Enterprise HSM with production-ready native PQC algorithms. FIPS 140-3 Level 3 validated with ML-KEM and ML-DSA.

pqc_capability_description: PQC roadmap includes support for NIST algorithms. German HSM vendor positioning for post-quantum transition in European markets and critical infrastructure.
product_brief: General purpose HSM platform for enterprise cryptographic operations and key management.

pqc_capability_description: Limited hybrid PQC support in key management operations. AWS is gradually rolling out quantum-safe capabilities across KMS to protect customer encryption keys against future quantum threats.
product_brief: Managed service for creating and controlling encryption keys. Integrates with AWS services.

pqc_capability_description: Experimental support for SLH-DSA in Transit secrets engine. Enables quantum-resistant encryption-as-a-service for protecting data in transit. Early adoption in enterprise secrets management.
product_brief: Enterprise secrets management encryption-as-a-service and privileged access management. Supports PKI SSH transit encryption.

pqc_capability_description: KMS-level PQC key types for customer use. Key Encapsulation (GA): ML-KEM-768 ML-KEM-1024 and X-Wing (hybrid ML-KEM-768 + X25519). Digital Signatures (Preview): ML-DSA-65 and SLH-DSA-SHA2-128S. Customers can create manage and use PQC keys directly.
fips_validated: Yes (FIPS 140-2 L1 software / L3 Cloud HSM)
product_brief: Cloud-hosted key management with industry-leading PQC key type support. ML-KEM GA and ML-DSA/SLH-DSA in preview.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC key types currently exposed through Key Vault API or Managed HSM. Underlying SymCrypt library implements ML-KEM and ML-DSA available via Windows CNG APIs. Microsoft roadmap targets quantum-safe services by 2029.
product_brief: Cloud key management. PQC not yet available as key types but underlying SymCrypt library is PQC-capable.

pqc_capability_description: Tech preview PQC support in v2.21+. ML-KEM TLS cipher on web interface for HNDL protection. Full PQC key lifecycle via Luna HSM v7.9 integration with native ML-DSA and ML-KEM.
product_brief: Enterprise key management with PQC tech preview. Full PQC key lifecycle through Luna HSM v7.9 integration.

pqc_capability_description: Full PQC key management with ML-KEM ML-DSA and SLH-DSA key types. Supports encapsulation decapsulation sign and verify operations. PQ-TLS for KMIP connections. nShield 5 HSM v13.8.0 natively supports PQC with CAVP validation.
product_brief: Enterprise key management with production PQC key types. Integrated with nShield 5 HSMs for hardware-accelerated quantum-safe key lifecycle.

pqc_capability_description: GKLM does not have PQC key types yet. IBM launched Guardium Cryptography Manager (Oct 2025) for PQC migration with posture visibility and remediation workflows. GKLM supports crypto-agility for future PQC adoption.
fips_validated: Yes (FIPS 140-3 L1 / optional L3 with HSM)
product_brief: Enterprise key lifecycle management with KMIP support. PQC migration via companion Guardium Cryptography Manager.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC features in v21.13. Oracle PQC efforts focused on database TLS (ML-KEM in Oracle 26ai) and JDK-level PQC (ML-DSA in JDK 26). Key Vault PQC expected via Oracle ecosystem integration.
product_brief: Oracle database encryption key management. PQC not yet available; expected through broader Oracle platform PQC rollout.

pqc_capability_description: PQC key management via u.trust Anchor HSM with Quantum Protect package. ML-KEM ML-DSA and LMS passed NIST CAVP testing (Oct 2025). First industry-certified KMIP v2.1 implementation.
product_brief: Enterprise key management with PQC-ready architecture. Integrated with u.trust Anchor HSM for quantum-safe key lifecycle.

pqc_capability_description: PKI software with PQC support via Bouncy Castle integration. Can issue X.509 certificates with quantum-resistant signatures (ML-DSA) and support hybrid certificate chains.
product_brief: Enterprise PKI and Certificate Authority software. Supports X.509 CMP SCEP EST ACME protocols.

pqc_capability_description: Commercial PKI platform with full PQC certificate lifecycle management. Supports quantum-safe certificate issuance, renewal, and revocation for enterprise PKI infrastructure.
product_brief: Commercial enterprise PKI platform with cloud deployment HSM integration and crypto agility features.

pqc_capability_description: Crypto agility features enable PQC algorithm management across enterprise certificate infrastructure. Automated discovery and migration planning for quantum-safe PKI transition.
product_brief: Machine identity management platform. Automates certificate lifecycle across enterprise infrastructure.

pqc_capability_description: AWS TLS implementation with ML-KEM hybrid key exchange. Kyber support removed in v1.7.0 in favor of standardized ML-KEM only. Used across AWS services to provide quantum-safe communications. Designed for high-performance cloud environments.
product_brief: AWS's C99 implementation of TLS/SSL protocols. Designed for simplicity security and performance. Kyber removed in v1.7.0; ML-KEM only.

pqc_capability_description: Google's fork with ML-KEM support. Used in Chrome browser and Google infrastructure. Pioneering deployment of quantum-safe key exchange at internet scale.
product_brief: Google's fork of OpenSSL optimized for Google's needs. Not intended for general use but influences industry standards.

pqc_capability_description: Supports ML-KEM with X25519 hybrid key exchange (X25519MLKEM768) and ML-DSA signatures via liboqs and leancrypto integration. Enables quantum-safe TLS in GNU/Linux applications.
product_brief: GNU implementation of TLS SSL and DTLS protocols. Features SRP X.509 OpenPGP authentication. Used by many GNU/Linux applications.

pqc_support: Yes (ML-KEM 768/1024 imported from BoringSSL - not yet public API)
pqc_capability_description: Imported ML-KEM 768 and 1024 from BoringSSL. PQC support currently in development, not yet exposed in public API but demonstrates OpenBSD's commitment to quantum-safe cryptography.
product_brief: OpenBSD fork of OpenSSL focused on code modernization and security. Includes libtls for simplified secure programming.

pqc_capability_description: Memory-safe TLS library with PQC support via aws-lc-rs (AWS libcrypto for Rust). Enables quantum-resistant TLS in Rust applications with zero unsafe code. Includes separate rustls-post-quantum crate.
product_brief: Modern TLS library written in Rust. Memory-safe alternative to OpenSSL. No unsafe code in core library.

pqc_capability_description: Embedded-focused TLS library with ML-DSA, ML-KEM, and Kyber support. Optimized for resource-constrained environments like IoT devices and embedded systems. Enables quantum-safe communications in automotive, industrial, and edge computing.
primary_platforms: Embedded Linux Windows RTOS ESP32 STM32
product_brief: Lightweight portable TLS/SSL library for embedded devices to cloud. Supports TLS 1.3 DTLS 1.3 with small footprint. Includes wolfCrypt crypto engine.

pqc_capability_description: Digital signing platform with PQC support via modules. Can create quantum-resistant signatures for documents, code, and timestamps using ML-DSA and other PQC algorithms.
product_brief: Open source signing platform. Supports various signature formats and HSM integration.

pqc_capability_description: IPsec VPN with experimental ML-KEM support. Enables quantum-safe VPN tunnels for site-to-site and remote access scenarios. Active development for production deployment.
product_brief: Open source IPsec-based VPN solution supporting IKEv1 IKEv2 and various authentication methods.

pqc_capability_description: Signal's approach includes PQXDH and SPQR Ratchet for quantum-resistant messaging combining X25519, Kyber/ML-KEM, and double-ratchet protocol for forward secrecy.
product_brief: Double Ratchet protocol providing end-to-end encryption with forward secrecy and post-compromise security.

pqc_capability_description: Default key exchange now uses mlkem768x25519-sha256 hybrid PQC. Combines ML-KEM-768 with X25519 elliptic curve for quantum-resistant SSH connections. First major SSH implementation to deploy PQC by default.
product_brief: Premier connectivity tool for SSH protocol. Provides secure tunneling multiple authentication methods. Default key exchange now uses mlkem768x25519-sha256 hybrid PQC.

pqc_capability_description: SSH implementation with Kyber and Ed25519 hybrid support. Provides quantum-resistant secure shell connections for embedded systems and IoT devices.
product_brief: Small fast portable SSH implementation with SCP and SFTP support. Designed for embedded and resource-constrained environments.

pqc_support: Yes (ML-KEM ML-DSA SLH-DSA BIKE HQC FrodoKEM Classic McEliece)
pqc_capability_description: Reference implementation library from Open Quantum Safe project. Comprehensive support for NIST-standardized algorithms (ML-KEM, ML-DSA, SLH-DSA) plus additional candidates including BIKE, HQC, FrodoKEM, and Classic McEliece. Serves as foundation for integrating PQC into applications and protocols.
product_brief: Open source C library for quantum-safe cryptographic algorithms. Part of Open Quantum Safe project under Linux Foundation PQCA.

pqc_capability_description: OpenSSL 3 provider enabling quantum-safe cryptography in TLS 1.3, X.509 certificates, and CMS operations. Supports all liboqs algorithms and enables hybrid key exchange combining classical ECDH with PQC KEMs. Critical for quantum-safe TLS deployments.
product_brief: OpenSSL 3 provider enabling quantum-safe and hybrid key exchange for TLS 1.3 X.509 and CMS operations.

pqc_capability_description: Protocol analyzer with PQC detection capabilities. Can scan servers and identify quantum-safe cipher suites, key exchange algorithms, and certificate types. Essential for PQC deployment verification.
product_brief: Fast SSL/TLS scanning library. Analyzes server configurations.

pqc_capability_description: Command-line TLS testing tool with PQC detection. Helps security teams audit TLS configurations for quantum-safe readiness and identify legacy cryptography.
product_brief: Command-line TLS/SSL testing tool. Checks protocols ciphers and vulnerabilities.

pqc_capability_description: Cryptographic security analysis platform with PQC readiness assessment. Discovers existing crypto usage, identifies quantum-vulnerable implementations, and provides migration recommendations.
product_brief: Cryptographic security analysis platform. Discovers crypto usage and vulnerabilities.

pqc_capability_description: Purpose-built quantum-safe security toolkit. Core focus on PQC migration with algorithm agility, hybrid modes, and enterprise integration. Comprehensive solution for organizational PQC transition.
product_brief: Quantum-safe security toolkit. Enables smooth PQC transition.

pqc_capability_description: Secure bootloader with ML-DSA signature verification. Ensures firmware integrity using quantum-resistant digital signatures. v2.7.0 adds new hardware targets including Vorago VA416x0 and Nordic nRF5340 TrustZone support. Critical for long-lived embedded devices and IoT.
product_brief: Universal secure bootloader with HSM integration and PQC support (ML-DSA). Suitable for IoT automotive and aerospace applications.

pqc_capability_description: General availability of PQC algorithms in November 2025 update. Supports ML-KEM and ML-DSA via CNG and Certificate functions.
product_brief: Microsoft's latest server OS with native PQC support via CNG.

pqc_capability_description: Native API support for quantum-resistant cryptography including PQ3 and TSPHINCS+. Upgraded TLS 1.3 and Adiantum v2 for data at rest protection.
product_brief: Next-gen Android OS with native PQC APIs and updated TLS 1.3.

pqc_capability_description: System-wide PQC support including PQ3 for iMessage and HPKE with ML-KEM 768/1024 and ML-DSA-65/ML-DSA-87. APIs for third-party apps via CryptoKit. Quantum-secure TLS negotiation with automatic fallback. Apple services adopting quantum-secure TLS including CloudKit Safari and iCloud Private Relay.
product_brief: Apple's latest OS releases with comprehensive system-level PQC support via CryptoKit ML-KEM and ML-DSA APIs.

pqc_capability_description: Supports RFC 8784 for Post-Quantum using Pre-Shared Keys (PPK) in IKEv2. PQC signatures for software images using ML-DSA-87 across ACX EX MX QFX SRX PTX Series. Quantum Buffer in SSH for cryptoagility. Hybrid NTRU Prime 761 + X25519 key exchange in SSH.
product_brief: Network OS with full-stack PQC including RFC 8784 ML-DSA image signing and quantum-safe SSH.

pqc_capability_description: PAN-OS 12.1 Orion release supports NIST standard PQC algorithms (ML-KEM ML-DSA). Features quantum readiness dashboard with real-time cryptographic asset inventory compliance validation and inline remediation. Automated cipher translation instantly upgrades applications to quantum-safe encryption. Fifth-generation quantum-optimized NGFWs including PA-5500 and ruggedized PA-455R-5G.
product_brief: Next-gen firewall OS with specialized PQC hardware acceleration cipher translation and quantum readiness dashboard.

pqc_support: Yes (ML-KEM BIKE HQC Frodo IPsec PQC)
pqc_capability_description: FortiOS 7.6 provides built-in quantum-safe features for FortiGate NGFW and Secure SD-WAN. Integrates NIST-approved ML-KEM plus BIKE HQC and Frodo algorithms for IPsec key exchange. Supports hybrid mode for gradual transition. QKD integration available since FortiOS 7.4. No extra cost for FortiOS customers.
product_brief: Security-driven OS with native PQC IPsec VPN and SD-WAN support including ML-KEM BIKE HQC and Frodo.

pqc_capability_description: R82 recommended release with QSKE (Quantum Safe Key Exchange) using ML-KEM (Kyber512/768/1024). Default MKE proposal configures DH group 15 + Kyber768. Supports quantum-safe key exchange for IKEv2 site-to-site VPNs. Remote access VPN PQC support on roadmap for Windows macOS and Linux clients.
product_brief: Firewall software with ML-KEM quantum-safe VPN key exchange. R82 recommended release with active 2026 updates.

pqc_capability_description: Meta-library providing a unified API for crypto agility. Uses liboqs backend to support wide range of PQC algorithms.
product_brief: Crypto-agility library with unified API and liboqs backend.

pqc_capability_description: Cloudflare Interoperable Reusable Cryptographic Library. Optimized Go implementation of ML-KEM and ML-DSA.
product_brief: Cloudflare's advanced crypto library for Go, specializing in PQC experiments.

pqc_capability_description: WireGuard tunnels with post-quantum protection enabled by default. Uses ML-KEM PSK for hybrid quantum resistance. OpenVPN support removed January 15 2026 - WireGuard only. New Rust-based WireGuard engine (GotaTun) live on Android with desktop and iOS planned for 2026. QUIC and LWO obfuscation added.
product_brief: Privacy-focused VPN with default post-quantum WireGuard tunnels. OpenVPN retired January 2026.

pqc_capability_description: Proprietary Lightway protocol upgraded from Kyber to NIST-standardized ML-KEM via wolfSSL integration. Now uses NIST Security Level 5 key sizes for both TCP and UDP protocols. Hybrid cryptography approach combining classical and quantum-safe algorithms.
product_brief: Lightway protocol upgraded to ML-KEM via wolfSSL with NIST Security Level 5 protection.

pqc_capability_description: TutaCrypt protocol upgraded from Kyber to ML-KEM compatibility following NIST standardization. Hybrid encryption combining ML-KEM with X25519 ECDH. Enabled by default for all new accounts. Over 50% of existing users migrated to TutaCrypt protocol. Side-channel vulnerability mitigations applied to encryption libraries.
product_brief: Encrypted email service using TutaCrypt (ML-KEM hybrid) protocol. Over 50% user migration complete.

pqc_capability_description: Analytics and SDK platform for crypto inventory and agility. Enables automated discovery and migration to PQC without code changes.
product_brief: Crypto agility platform for discovery, inventory, and automated remediation.

pqc_capability_description: First HSM to receive PCI HSM validation with PQC support. Supports ML-DSA and ML-KEM for financial and enterprise security.
product_brief: PCI HSM validated Hardware Security Module with native PQC support.

pqc_capability_description: Automated cryptographic discovery platform for post-quantum migration and compliance. Continuously identifies encryption assets legacy algorithms and deprecated protocols across networks applications and cloud environments. Selected by UK NCSC for Post-Quantum Cryptography Pilot under Assured Cyber Security Consultancy Scheme. Available as SaaS or via certified systems integrator partners.
product_brief: Crypto discovery and risk prioritization platform for PQC migration. UK NCSC PQC Pilot participant.

pqc_capability_description: First embedded Secure Element (eSE) to integrate post-quantum cryptography. Features two dedicated PQC hardware accelerators achieving 18x faster cryptographic operations than software-only approaches. Powered by Thales secure OS and PQC libraries. CES 2026 Best Cybersecurity Innovation Award winner. Designed for Common Criteria EAL6+ certification. Quantum-resistant security for IoT mobile and embedded devices.
product_brief: First PQC-enabled embedded Secure Element with hardware-accelerated ML-KEM. CES 2026 Best Cybersecurity Innovation.

pqc_capability_description: Payment HSM with crypto-agile architecture. No specific PQC algorithms confirmed in payment HSM firmware yet. Thales Luna HSM line supports ML-KEM and ML-DSA but payShield payment firmware has not publicly announced PQC algorithm support. EMV PCI DSS 4.0 compliant. PCI PTS HSM v4 certified.
fips_validated: Yes (PCI PTS HSM v4 FIPS 140-2 L3)
product_brief: Industry-leading payment HSM processing over 80% of global card transactions. Crypto-agile architecture positions for future PQC firmware updates.

pqc_capability_description: Payment HSM with crypto-agile architecture. No specific PQC algorithms publicly confirmed for Vectera Plus payment firmware. Futurex CryptoHub general-purpose HSM has ML-DSA and ML-KEM support suggesting payment HSM PQC firmware is in development. PCI PTS HSM v3 certified.
fips_validated: Yes (PCI PTS HSM v3 FIPS 140-2 L3)
product_brief: Payment HSM for transaction processing PIN management and key injection. Futurex general HSM platform already has PQC.

pqc_capability_description: Payment HSM with PQC on roadmap. Utimaco SecurityServer general-purpose HSM has announced PQC roadmap for NIST algorithms. Athos payment-specific HSM firmware does not yet publicly list ML-KEM or ML-DSA support. German vendor positioning for European PCI DSS and EMV compliance.
product_brief: European payment HSM for EMV key management PIN processing and mobile payments. PQC expected via firmware update.

pqc_capability_description: Legacy payment HSM now under OpenText (acquired from Micro Focus/HPE). No public PQC roadmap or algorithm support announcements found. Limited development activity since OpenText acquisition.
product_brief: Legacy payment HSM. No public PQC plans. Organizations should evaluate migration to PQC-ready alternatives.

pqc_capability_description: Crypto Key Management System for payment infrastructure. No specific PQC algorithm support publicly announced. Partners with HSM vendors (Thales Utimaco) for hardware-backed operations.
product_brief: Key management platform for payment systems. PQC support will likely come through underlying HSM vendor firmware updates.

pqc_capability_description: Confirmed PQC support with hybrid operations. Supports ML-KEM (FIPS 203) ML-DSA (FIPS 204) SLH-DSA (FIPS 205) plus stateful hash-based signatures HSS-LMS and XMSS. CloudHSM ECO and SBX environments available for PQC testing. Swiss-engineered HSM.
product_brief: Swiss HSM with comprehensive PQC algorithm support including all three NIST standards plus stateful hash-based signatures.

pqc_capability_description: Cloud HSM adapter providing hardware-accelerated cryptographic operations. No public PQC algorithm support announced. Focuses on cloud-scale key management and TLS offloading.
product_brief: Cloud HSM adapter for hyperscale environments. PQC firmware updates expected as NIST standards mature.

pqc_capability_description: Managed HSM service using FIPS 140-2 Level 3 validated hardware. Does not currently expose PQC algorithms through CloudHSM API despite AWS-LC library having PQC support.
product_brief: Managed single-tenant HSM service. PQC algorithms not yet available through CloudHSM API.

pqc_capability_description: Cloud KMS with HSM-backed keys using FIPS 140-2 Level 3 hardware. Does not currently support PQC algorithms for customer key operations. Google uses hybrid PQC internally but Cloud HSM/KMS API does not expose PQC key types.
product_brief: Google managed HSM service. PQC not yet available for customer keys despite Google internal PQC deployment.

pqc_capability_description: PQC pioneer with hybrid certificate issuance capabilities. Supports hybrid X.509 certificates combining classical RSA/ECDSA with ML-DSA signatures. PQC certificate testing environment available. Automated discovery of quantum-vulnerable certificates.
product_brief: Leading CA with PQC hybrid certificate capabilities. Automated certificate lifecycle management with quantum readiness assessment.

pqc_capability_description: Dedicated PQC readiness page indicates active development. Certificate lifecycle management platform preparing for PQC certificate issuance. Hybrid certificate support expected.
product_brief: Major CA preparing for PQC certificate transition. Certificate lifecycle management platform with PQC readiness planning.

pqc_capability_description: PKI platform with PQC capabilities via nShield HSM integration. Supports hybrid certificate operations combining classical and post-quantum algorithms.
product_brief: Enterprise PKI with PQC support via nShield HSM integration. Hybrid certificate operations for gradual PQC transition.

pqc_capability_description: Windows Server 2025 includes ML-KEM and ML-DSA in CNG but AD CS certificate templates do not yet natively support PQC algorithm OIDs for certificate issuance.
product_brief: Windows PKI platform. CNG has PQC algorithms but AD CS templates do not yet support PQC certificate issuance natively.

pqc_capability_description: Modern zero-trust CA built in Go. Go 1.24+ includes crypto/mlkem with ML-KEM support. However step-ca does not yet expose PQC certificate issuance APIs. PQC-aware TLS for ACME and mTLS connections possible via Go runtime.
product_brief: Modern CA with ACME support. PQC certificate issuance not yet available but Go runtime provides transport-layer quantum safety.

pqc_capability_description: Clean portable C implementations of all NIST PQC algorithms. Focused on correctness readability and ease of integration. Each implementation is standalone with no external dependencies. Used as reference by pqcrypto Rust crate.
product_brief: Clean standalone C implementations of PQC algorithms. Reference quality code used by multiple language binding projects.

pqc_capability_description: Official NIST reference implementations of ML-KEM (FIPS 203) and ML-DSA (FIPS 204). Canonical implementation used for validation and testing.
product_brief: NIST reference implementations for ML-KEM and ML-DSA. Canonical source for algorithm correctness validation.

pqc_capability_description: IBM's quantum-safe cryptography toolkit with ML-KEM ML-DSA and SLH-DSA. IBM z16 provides on-chip quantum-safe acceleration. Quantum Safe Explorer tool for discovering and remediating quantum-vulnerable cryptography.
product_brief: Enterprise PQC toolkit with mainframe hardware acceleration. Includes discovery and migration tools.

pqc_capability_description: Java implementation of JWS JWE JWK and JWT standards. No PQC algorithm support. Supports RSA ECDSA HMAC AES with standard JOSE algorithms. PQC blocked by IETF draft-ietf-jose-pqc-algorithms standardization.
product_brief: Java JOSE library. No PQC. Blocked by IETF PQC JOSE specification.

pqc_capability_description: Feature-rich Java JOSE library. No PQC algorithm support. Comprehensive implementation of RFC 7515-7519 with RSA ECDSA EdDSA and AES. PQC dependent on IETF draft-ietf-jose-pqc-algorithms finalization.
product_brief: Java JOSE/JWT library. No PQC. Awaiting IETF PQC JOSE specification.

pqc_capability_description: Most popular Node.js JWT library. No PQC algorithm support. Uses RSA ECDSA HMAC for token signing. PQC integration blocked by IETF PQC JOSE specification and Node.js crypto API PQC support.
product_brief: Node.js JWT library. No PQC. Dependent on Node.js crypto API and IETF PQC JOSE specification.

pqc_capability_description: Go implementation of JOSE standards. No PQC support despite Go 1.24+ having native crypto/mlkem in stdlib.
product_brief: Go JOSE library. No PQC support despite Go stdlib having native ML-KEM.

pqc_capability_description: No current PQC support. Open GitHub issue #18103 requests Java 25 PQC support. Could leverage Bouncy Castle PQC provider once IETF standardizes PQC identifiers for JOSE.
product_brief: Spring Security OAuth2/JWT framework. Community-requested PQC support pending.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC algorithm support in current UEFI Secure Boot specification (UEFI 2.10). Signature database supports RSA-2048 SHA-256 only. Future revisions expected to add ML-DSA/SLH-DSA for firmware signature verification.
product_brief: Industry standard firmware interface. PQC for Secure Boot awaiting specification update.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC algorithm support. Open-source firmware uses vboot (Google Verified Boot) with RSA and SHA-256. Zero GitHub issues for post-quantum algorithms.
product_brief: Open-source firmware replacing proprietary BIOS/UEFI. No PQC support for firmware verification.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC algorithm support. Universal Boot Loader supports FIT image verification using RSA-2048/4096 and SHA-256/512. PQC signature verification not on roadmap.
product_brief: Universal bootloader for embedded systems. Verified boot uses RSA/SHA only. No PQC support.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC algorithm support for file integrity verification. IMA and EVM use RSA/ECDSA signatures and SHA-256/512. Kernel crypto API does not include ML-DSA or SLH-DSA.
product_brief: Linux kernel integrity subsystem. IMA/EVM file verification limited to RSA/ECDSA.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC firmware signature verification in current Secure Boot. CNG supports ML-KEM/ML-DSA for applications but Secure Boot chain still uses RSA-2048.
product_brief: Microsoft Secure Boot. Classical RSA/SHA signatures only. PQC firmware signing expected in future releases.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC algorithm support. Secure Boot for ARM uses RSA-2048/3072 ECDSA-P256. Zero GitHub issues for post-quantum algorithms.
product_brief: Reference implementation of ARM Secure Boot. Classical signatures only.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC algorithm support. Uses AES-256 (quantum-resistant) for symmetric encryption. Community feature requests for PQC (GitHub issues #498 #1406) closed without implementation. Key derivation lacks PQC key encapsulation.
product_brief: Open-source disk encryption. AES-256 is quantum-resistant but lacks PQC key encapsulation.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC key wrapping support. Uses AES-128/256 with XTS mode. Windows CNG supports ML-KEM/ML-DSA but BitLocker key protection chain not updated to use PQC. AES-256-XTS is quantum-resistant.
product_brief: Microsoft full disk encryption. AES-XTS is quantum-safe but key protection chain uses classical RSA via TPM.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC algorithm support. LUKS2 uses AES-XTS-256 with Argon2id for key derivation. No PQC key encapsulation for master key wrapping. AES-256-XTS is quantum-resistant.
product_brief: Linux disk encryption standard. AES-256-XTS is quantum-safe but key management lacks PQC.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC key wrapping support. AES-XTS-256 for full-volume encryption. Apple CryptoKit has ML-KEM/ML-DSA but FileVault key protection chain not updated. AES-256-XTS is quantum-resistant.
product_brief: Apple full-disk encryption. AES-256-XTS is quantum-safe but key wrapping has not adopted CryptoKit PQC APIs.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC algorithm support. Client-Side Field Level Encryption uses AES-256. Data Encryption Keys wrapped via AWS KMS Azure Key Vault or GCP KMS using RSA-OAEP. AES-256 is quantum-resistant but key management relies on classical PKI.
product_brief: MongoDB client-side encryption. AES-256 is quantum-safe but key wrapping uses classical algorithms.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC algorithm support. Transparent Data Encryption uses AES-128/192/256. Master key stored in Oracle Key Vault using PKCS#12 with RSA key transport. AES-256 is quantum-resistant.
product_brief: Oracle database transparent encryption. Classical RSA key management. No PQC key wrapping.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC algorithm support. TDE uses AES-256. Always Encrypted uses AES-256-CBC with HMAC. Column Encryption Keys wrapped by RSA-OAEP. Microsoft CNG supports ML-KEM but SQL Server has not integrated PQC.
product_brief: Microsoft SQL Server encryption. Classical RSA key wrapping. CNG has PQC but SQL Server has not adopted it.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC algorithm support. pgcrypto provides AES and PGP encryption using OpenSSL backend. OpenSSL 3.5+ has ML-KEM/ML-DSA but pgcrypto does not expose PQC functions.
product_brief: PostgreSQL encryption extension. Uses OpenSSL backend but does not expose PQC algorithms.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC algorithm support. MySQL provides RSA DH DSA and ECDH functions via OpenSSL. InnoDB tablespace encryption uses AES-256. No ML-KEM ML-DSA functions exposed.
product_brief: MySQL enterprise encryption functions. Classical RSA/DSA/ECDH only.

pqc_capability_description: No PQC algorithm support. Encryption at Rest uses AES-128/192/256-CTR. Go 1.26 has native ML-KEM for TLS but CockroachDB has not integrated PQC for encryption at rest.
product_brief: CockroachDB encryption at rest. AES-256 is quantum-safe. Go stdlib ML-KEM not integrated.

pqc_capability_description: First major email provider to deploy post-quantum encryption. Uses hybrid Curve25519 + ML-KEM key encapsulation for end-to-end encrypted email. Deployed to all users September 2023.
product_brief: First email provider with production PQC encryption protecting emails against quantum threats.

pqc_capability_description: Implements IETF PQC-in-OpenPGP draft. Supports composite PQC keys combining ML-KEM-768 with X25519 for encryption and ML-DSA-65 with Ed25519 for signing.
product_brief: Reference OpenPGP implementation with PQC composite key support for quantum-resistant email and file encryption.

pqc_capability_description: Uses RNP library for OpenPGP. RNP does not implement PQC algorithms. Dependent on IETF PQC-in-OpenPGP standard finalization.
product_brief: Open source email client with OpenPGP. PQC dependent on RNP library.

pqc_capability_description: Windows CNG has ML-KEM/ML-DSA but Outlook S/MIME has not shipped PQC certificate support. Dependent on CA ecosystem issuing PQC X.509 certificates.
product_brief: Enterprise email with S/MIME encryption. PQC primitives available in OS but not in Outlook S/MIME workflow.

pqc_capability_description: Uses RSA and ECDSA for PDF digital signatures (PAdES). No PQC signature support announced. Dependent on ETSI PAdES specification updates for PQC.
product_brief: Leading eSignature platform. PQC dependent on ETSI PAdES and CA ecosystem readiness.

pqc_capability_description: Uses RSA-2048/4096 and SHA-256. No public PQC announcements. PQC transition depends on PKI ecosystem supporting PQC signature algorithms.
product_brief: Market-leading eSignature platform. PQC dependent on PKI ecosystem updates.

pqc_capability_description: DigiCert is actively involved in PQC with hybrid TLS certificates. SigningHub positioned for PQC through DigiCert infrastructure but has not yet shipped PQC document signatures.
product_brief: Cloud document signing with PQC roadmap through DigiCert PQC certificate infrastructure.

pqc_capability_description: PQC capabilities in nShield HSMs. ML-DSA and SLH-DSA integration expected through HSM backend upgrades. No confirmed production PQC signing deployment.
product_brief: Enterprise signing automation. PQC capabilities available through Entrust nShield HSM backend.

pqc_capability_description: Cloud-based digital signing using RSA and ECDSA. No public PQC announcements. Active CA/Browser Forum member discussing PQC certificate profiles.
product_brief: CA-backed digital signing service. PQC dependent on CA/Browser Forum PQC certificate standards.

pqc_capability_description: Uses ECDSA P-256 and Ed25519 for container image signing. PQC on roadmap but not yet implemented. Fulcio CA and Rekor transparency log would need PQC updates.
product_brief: Keyless code signing for containers. PQC integration planned for Fulcio CA and Rekor transparency log.

pqc_capability_description: Windows CNG has ML-KEM/ML-DSA but Authenticode code signing not yet updated for PQC algorithms. Dual-signing approach likely for backward compatibility.
product_brief: Windows code signing tool. PQC primitives in CNG but Authenticode format not yet updated.

pqc_capability_description: Apple has PQ3 for iMessage and ML-KEM/ML-DSA in CryptoKit but code signing infrastructure not moved to PQC. Mach-O code signature format needs updates.
product_brief: Apple platform code signing. PQC available in CryptoKit but code signing infrastructure not updated.

pqc_capability_description: CNCF container image signing using X.509 certificates. RSA and ECDSA only. Plugin architecture could enable future PQC through third-party providers.
product_brief: CNCF container image signing. Plugin architecture may enable future PQC integration.

pqc_capability_description: GnuPG 2.5.x supports PQC composite signatures per IETF PQC-in-OpenPGP draft. ML-DSA-65 combined with Ed25519 for quantum-resistant code and package signing.
product_brief: OpenPGP code signing with PQC composite signatures. Used for software package and Git commit signing.

pqc_capability_description: Enterprise code signing with secure key storage and CI/CD integration. Positioned for PQC through DigiCert PQC certificate infrastructure. PQC code signing certificates not yet generally available.
product_brief: Enterprise code signing platform. PQC roadmap through DigiCert PQC certificate program.

pqc_capability_description: KMS API endpoints support hybrid PQC TLS key exchange (ECDH + ML-KEM) for data in transit protection. Powered by AWS-LC with FIPS 140-3 validated ML-KEM. Native PQC key types on roadmap.
product_brief: Managed key management with hybrid PQC TLS for API calls. Native PQC key types on roadmap.

pqc_capability_description: Cloud encryption gateway with PQC key types. ML-KEM-768/1024 and X-Wing (GA) for key encapsulation. ML-DSA-65 and SLH-DSA (Preview) for signing. Powered by BoringCrypto and Tink. Cloud HSM uses Marvell LiquidSecurity.
fips_validated: Yes (FIPS 140-2 L1 software / L3 Cloud HSM)
product_brief: Cloud encryption gateway with industry-leading PQC key type support for encapsulation and signing.

pqc_capability_description: Microsoft SymCrypt has ML-KEM/ML-DSA but Azure Key Vault has not added PQC key types for customer operations. Managed HSM uses Marvell LiquidSecurity.
product_brief: Cloud key management with HSM backing. PQC in SymCrypt but not exposed as Key Vault key types.

pqc_capability_description: Multicloud key management with Confidential Computing (Intel SGX). PQC algorithm support on product roadmap but not confirmed as shipped.
product_brief: Multicloud encryption gateway with Confidential Computing. PQC on roadmap.

pqc_capability_description: Centralized key management and encryption gateway. Integrates with Thales Luna HSMs (firmware 7.9+) with ML-KEM and ML-DSA. Transparent encryption and tokenization.
product_brief: Enterprise encryption gateway with PQC via Luna HSM. Centralized multicloud key management.

pqc_capability_description: Cloud-hosted encryption backed by CryptoHub HSMs with PCI HSM validated PQC. Supports ML-DSA and ML-KEM. KMES Series 3 VirtuCrypt cloud HSM.
product_brief: Cloud encryption gateway backed by PCI HSM validated PQC hardware.
